snippet.title: F1 2012 | Official Launch Trailer | HD
snippet.description:
Codemasters' premiere racing experience F1 2012 launched to worldwide critical acclaim. FACEBOOK: http://goo.gl/yTEwK | TWITTER: http://goo.gl/EI39v
SUBSCRIBE to XboxViewTV: http://goo.gl/SRfoq
XBLA and XBLIG games: http://YouTube.com/ArcadeNEXT
Tägl. News auf XboxDome [DE]: http://www.xboxdome.de
XboxViewTV also on MyTopTrailer: http://mytoptrailer.com/show.php?channel=XboxViewTV&vid=TJzEIfaiz2E

To commemorate the launch, the racing studio has released a new trailer showcasing stunning wheel-to-wheel racing at authentically and beautifully recognized circuits, including the multimillion dollar Circuit of the Americas track, opening in Austin this fall. F1 2012 is available now for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and PC via Steam.

ABOUT THIS GAME
-----------------------------------
F1 2012 will launch worldwide in September for PC, Xbox 360 and PS3. F1 2012 will introduce a new Young Driver Test mode as one of the headline additions to the series that will take players even closer to the experience of becoming a FORMULA ONE driver. Players will be introduced to the world of FORMULA ONE through a range of tutorials explaining how to handle racing's most exciting and responsive cars, and challenged to earn a drive from a team for the 2012 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP.

---DEUTSCH---
In F1 2012 werden die Spieler das unvergleichliche Erlebnis haben, wie es ist, ein Formel 1 Rennfahrer zu werden. Dazu wird es eine ganze Reihe Neuerungen, technische sowie gameplay Verbesserungen geben und zahlreiche Multiplayer Features -- gegeneinander und kooperativ. Natürlich wird F1 2012 die offiziellen Teams, Fahrer und Strecken aus der Saison 2012 bieten, inklusive des brandneuen FORMULA 1 UNITED STATES GRAND PRIX in Austin, Texas und die Rückkehr des berühmten Hockenheim Ring in Deutschland.

F1 2012
---------------
GENRE: Racing
RELEASE DATE(S): 
+ US: September 18, 2012
+ EU: September 21, 2012
PLATFORM: Xbox 360
ALSO ON: PC, PS3
WEBSITE: http://www.formula1-game.com
AVAILABLE @ AMAZON: http://amzn.to/QUrpzi

PUBLISHER: Codemasters
DEVELOPER: Codemasters Studios Birmingham
ESRB: E for Everyone
